page.title: 07LEISURE FACILITIES
page.content: The most popular outdoor sports in Clydebank are football,Golf,Bowls and Tennis.Each school has it's own football pitch which is used by pupils and Youth clubs.There are other parks in Faifley and Hardgate with changing and club rooms which can be used by any local residents.There are two golf courses.Dalmuir is a public course and Clydebank & District is a private course with 800 members. There are public bowling greens and tennis courts in Hardgate and Faifley for use by all "Bankies" as local residents are called. Faifley and Duntocher each have a leisure centre for indoor sports.The Antonine Sports Centre also caters for indoor sports such as judo, boxing and weightlifting.Auchnacraig estate is to become a country park for walks to other areas such as the Kilpatrick Hills or the Highland Way.
